title: Bonnington, A Rising Star
content:
[Bonnington](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155642/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonnington/overview.html) has proven very popular and has now spent several weeks as a [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155642/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonnington/overview.html) rising star. To mark this, we thought we'd post some more views of the family in action:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bon2_5226.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bon4_4050.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bon3_6483.png)
author: Rasendyll
